text: aur ye log to khuda kee badee-badee sakht qasamen kha (kar kahate) the ki beshak agar unake paas koee daraane vaala (paigambar) aaega to vah zaroor har ek ummat se jyaada roobasah honge phir jab unake paas daraane vaala (rasool) aa pahuncha to (un logon ko) rooe zameen mein sarakashee aur buree-buree tadbeeren karane kee vajah se
